collection:
Data Collection

NewsChat.org and NewsPulse AI does not collect personal data from its users.

Use of Data

Since we do not collect personal data, there is no use of user data in our
service.

Your Rights

Given that we do not collect personal data, there are no specific user data
rights applicable to our service.
sharing:
Data Sharing

As we do not collect any user data, there is no sharing of personal data with
any third parties.
